channel.title: Menma’s Tera Guides on Tenacity
channel.description: Recent content in Menma’s Tera Guides on Tenacity

item.title: 1. Download
item.description: Create an account: https://account.menmastera.com/register Download link: https://menmastera.com/download Torrent file can be found on Menma’s Discord https://discord.gg/menmastera

item.title: 3. Introduction to basics
item.description: Basic about the server Server is running on old lvl70 Patch - 92.4 from March 2020 As of writing this post, server are located in Starsbourg, France, EU. Server is set to PvP As of writing this post,the client is 32-bit, and possible compatibility with a 64-bit client might come later. Support for Menma’s TERA has been added to Shinra which you can find HERE Skill advancements are same as normal Tera, but you have one EP page & no cards

item.title: 4.1 Gearing - PvP
item.description: Gear You require FULL PVP GEAR Since pve gear have debuffs on it for pvp : (Reduced damage by 80% & Increased damage taken by 100%) You should buy the GEAR ITSELF WITH HALIDOMS & RELICS on the first place , because they get instantly soulbounded to your character. After those you can make alts for another 5M Bellicarium Credit or just simply do battlegrounds for the rest.

item.title: 4.2 Gearing - PvE
item.description: Gear You get the basic blue Azart gear to start with when you make your character. You can get accessory crystals from vanguards credits, like in the original version. For Dark Light & Annihilation gear you should do dungeons such as Red Refuge & RK9, there you will get gear boxes (The gear options always random) Best you can get: 4x random roll on weapon (In addition to have double CRD) Except healers, their max rolls are 3x Enchanting gear You get feedstock from Guardians
